rules.description: full screen capture using cleanshot: print_screen

to.shell_command: open -g 'cleanshot://capture-fullscreen'
open -a 'Google Chrome.app'
open -a 'Cron.app'
open -a 'Visual Studio Code.app'
open -a 'Discord.app'
open -a 'Slack.app'
open -a 'Notion.app'
open -a 'iTerm.app'
open -a 'zoom.us.app'
open -a 'figma.app'
open -a 'Telegram Desktop.app'

manipulators.description: hyper+t ==> float / unfloat window and center on screen

to.shell_command: /opt/homebrew/bin/yabai -m window --toggle float; /opt/homebrew/bin/yabai -m window --grid 4:4:1:1:2:2
/opt/homebrew/bin/yabai -m window --toggle zoom-fullscreen
/opt/homebrew/bin/yabai -m window --swap west

manipulators.description: hyper+h ==> send window to monitor and follow focus

to.shell_command: /bin/dash /Users/mrp/dotfilesOSX/yabai/moveWindowLeftAndFollowFocus.sh
/opt/homebrew/bin/yabai -m window --swap east
DISPLAY="$(/opt/homebrew/bin/yabai -m query --displays --display | /opt/homebrew/bin/jq '.index')"; /opt/homebrew/bin/yabai -m space --focus $((1+4*($DISPLAY - 1)))
DISPLAY="$(/opt/homebrew/bin/yabai -m query --displays --display | /opt/homebrew/bin/jq '.index')"; /opt/homebrew/bin/yabai -m space --focus $((2+4*($DISPLAY - 1)))
DISPLAY="$(/opt/homebrew/bin/yabai -m query --displays --display | /opt/homebrew/bin/jq '.index')"; /opt/homebrew/bin/yabai -m space --focus $((3+4*($DISPLAY - 1)))
DISPLAY="$(/opt/homebrew/bin/yabai -m query --displays --display | /opt/homebrew/bin/jq '.index')"; /opt/homebrew/bin/yabai -m space --focus $((4+4*($DISPLAY - 1)))
